def.threejs.three

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.EventDispatcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationMixer, BufferGeometry, DirectGeometry, EditorControls, Geometry, Material, MTLLoader, Object3D, OrthographicTrackballControls, Texture, TrackballControls, WebGLRenderTarget

    public class EventDispatcher
extends def.js.Object
    JavaScript events for custom objects # Example var Car = function () { EventDispatcher.call( this ); this.start = function () { this.dispatchEvent( { type: 'start', message: 'vroom vroom!' } ); }; }; var car = new Car(); car.addEventListener( 'start', function ( event ) { alert( event.message ); } ); car.start();

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventDispatcher

        public EventDispatcher()
        Creates eventDispatcher object. It needs to be call with '.call' to add the functionality to an object.
